name: The Adventures of River and Fern
name_original: The Adventures of River and Fern
description:
📚The Story

A land that was once lively and colorful has now been consumed by The Darkness, a mysterious phenomenon that has stolen color and happiness from Comeunity. Leaving its citizens in a gloomy state...until our heroes River and Fern slowly but surely restore happiness to the community by partaking in quests to aid their neighbors.

River and Fern venture throughout Comeunity solving puzzles and fighting off enemies to help it grow and regain its color. Rotate between two characters to use different special abilities. 

Each quest our heroes complete unlock new stages that show how helping one member of our community can have a chain reaction for everyone. Each member they help, restores a community member’s ability which can be useful to other citizens. 

Although everything begins dark and grey, River and Fern’s positive effect on their society restores hope in a darkened world 🦊🐰

⌨️Instructions

Use arrow keys/WASD to move
Press E to interact with items and characters
I to pause the game and access inventory, journal log, map and settings
